name: tree-sitter-stack-graphs-javascript
description: Stack graphs definition for JavaScript using tree-sitter-javascript
author: Beka Valentine <bekavalentine@github.com>

scripts.test: npx tree-sitter-stack-graphs test --grammar node_modules/tree-sitter-javascript --tsg src/stack-graphs --builtins src/builtins test
scripts.test-file: npx tree-sitter-stack-graphs test --grammar node_modules/tree-sitter-javascript --tsg src/stack-graphs --builtins src/builtins
